amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funds for Fossil Fuel Research and Development programs by $554,000,000, and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the fossil energy research and development account by $554,000,000, and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 249 (Roll no. 317).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 249 (Roll no. 317).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. McClintock.
